name: Time to Die (guacamolegames)
description:
This is a game made for the WOWIE 3.0 game jam.

in this game, you want to be shot by your opponent's bullets, P1 (blue) uses WASD and P2 (red/pink) uses the arrow keys. W and S or up and down on the arrows moves you forwards and backwards, whereas A and D or left and right rotate you left and right.

i have no plans to update this.
